column2: That was a tough one, little fox.
The name's Dash.__ Just a fellow resistance fighter.__ Me and my guys are going to take the tower control.
But ain't no time for quick talk, those Selvos rats are coming again.
I have a special mission to accomplish for our boss, you'll need to head to our HQ alone.
It's located at the end of this floor._._. I'm sure a smart fox like you will be able to find the path by himself.
